name: BAGUIO - the beautiful city of Pines...relax with the city's cool breeze all year round...
description: Baguio is a beautiful city situated on top of the mountains, 4,500 feet above sea level.  As such, people enjoy a cool, climate all year round.  The temperature is about 9 to 15 degrees Celsius during the months of November to February;  24 to 29 degrees Celsius during the months of March to June; and 19 to 25 degrees Celsius during July to October.The trip to Baguio alone allows you to enjoy breathtaking views as you drive along the zigzag road to the mountaintop.
